getSimilarityTimingActual

public long getSimilarityTimingActual(java.lang.String string1,
                                      java.lang.String string2)
gets the actual time in milliseconds it takes to perform a similarity timing. This call takes as long as the similarity metric to perform so should not be done in normal cercumstances.

Parameters:
string1 - string 1
string2 - string 2
Returns:
the actual time in milliseconds taken to perform the similarity measure

string2 -
